summary: A high-profiled documentary about Hergé and his major cartoon success, Tintin, based in part on previously unreleased archive tape footage.
cast: Hergé|Numa Sadoul|Michael Farr|Harry Thompson|Raymond Leblanc|Germaine Kieckens|Andy Warhol|Fanny Rodwell|Gérard Valet|Chang Chong-Chen|Patrick Waleffe|Tony Beck|Alain Louis|Danièle Denie|Olivier Cuvelier|Per Kapper|Lars Kirchhoff|Karin Mørch|Björn Charpentier|Serge Crémer|Armand De Ridder|Peter Gren Larsen
keywords: tintin character|snowy the dog character|three word title|tape|cartoon
title: Tintin et moi
